summary:
A house full of surprises...
Harek stored low key all your valuables obtained in his travels through Skyrim and Solstheim, so that is not the steal Riekling
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=22][color=aqua]The Shore[/color][/size]
[/b]ObliSan Team Mod

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fgrA9JP.jpg[/img]


Good Nav Meshes, see de pic.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zPLc0p2.jpg[/img]


The owner of The Shore, Harek was collecting valuable objects during your travels in Skyrim and Solstheim.

The Riekling, little guys, but ambitious, began to watch him and follow him.

Harek saw that the Riekling were getting closer and increased in number,was closed with keys each of the doors and chests as he could, and departed the place.

The Riekling came to his house, seized her, were installed and are still on The Shore, looking for treasure.

Each door has a key.

Having found the first, they will find the following in the places that we go opening.

And all the treasure Harek, be ours.

The first key you have to take it from the Rieklings, others are stored in containers. Check all containers,many objects are containers ornaments.

On the roof terrace we have to plant flowerpots.

All containers are safe.

Requirements:
Dawnguard, Hearthfire y Dragonborn.

Compatibility:
Not compatible with Static Mesh Improvement-SMIM

Where is it?
-Ivarstead near the shores of Lake.

Installation:
-With NMM or copy and paste the file in the Data folder of the Skyrim installation.

Credits:
-Bethesda for making Skyrim.
- Nexus for giving me the opportunity to publish.
-To you for your downloads and encouragement to continue creating.
-And my Team, a small group, which unites the same illusion, make it bigger, the ObliSan Team.
-My attention and thanks to Ilpinfas (Sanchez) for their help, advice,tutorials, explanations and your time.

Contact sites (Spanish)
http://oblisanteam.creatuforo.es/index.php
